Please correct me if I am wrong...my solution is  Given IP of Host 182.44.82.16/26..Class B with /26 bits of subnetting.. means subnet belongs to 4th octet last 6 bits reserved for hosts..Subnet Genrator bit would be 7 bit of 4th octet..which become 64 as SG..so starting network ip of given question is 182.44.82.0 while last IP of this subnet would be 182.44.82.63 and so on..
